thread.title: New Fox Poll Shows How Many People Trust Trump More Than the Press and Vice Versa
thread.title_full: New Fox Poll Shows How Many People Trust Trump More Than the Press and Vice Versa

author: Josh Feldman
title: New Fox Poll Shows How Many People Trust Trump More Than the Press and Vice Versa
text:
New Fox Poll Shows How Many People Trust Trump More Than the Press and Vice Versa by Josh Feldman | 7:45   
With the war between President Trump and the press reaching new heights this week , Fox News released some very relevant poll results on media trustworthiness. 
The president himself has taken to pointing out the low approval ratings of the mainstream media, while critics of the president have pointed to his own approval ratings. 
The Fox poll out tonight finds that 45 percent of people trust Trump to tell the truth more than the press, while 42 percent trust the press more than the president. 10 percent said they trust neither. 
And, also very notably, 68 percent of people believe that the press coverage of Trump is tougher than the press coverage of Barack Obama was. 18 percent think the press is being easier on Trump than they were on Obama, and 12 percent think itâ€™s about the same. 
However, 55 percent of those polled favor aggressive coverage of the president compared to 38 percent who prefer the press give the president the benefit of the doubt. And 71 percent of people think Trump should be more careful when he speaks, while 28 percent like that he speaks his mind. 
[ image via screengrab ]
